title: Black Hawk Down / Team Sabre + ShocknAwe Mods / Serials
description:
Novalogic\&#039;s Delta Force Black Hawk Down

Includes the Team Sabre and ShocknAwe meds, and keys for Team Sabre and BHD. (Serial for ShocknAwe not needed)

Also includes BHD Server manager

Readme included:

1.) Copy Serial key from BHD_SERIAL.txt
2.) Double-click Setup.exe from BHD folder
3.) Run setup, paste key into setup when asked for the key
4.) Finish installation. do NOT register.
---
5.) Copy serial from BHDTS_SERIAL.txt
6.) Double-click Setup.exe from BHDTS folder
7.) Let Setup update the game
8.) Run setup, paste key into setup when asked for the key
9.) Finish installation, do NOT register
---
10.) Double click on Shock.exe
11.) Let ShocknAwe install (no key required)
---

To play ShocknAwe, use the shortcut that is made on the desktop.
To play Team Sabre, go into Program Files --> Novalogic --> Black Hawk Down folder. Then double click on \"ShocknAwe.exe\" 

Even though the exe is ShocknAwe, Team Sabre will be launched. I recommend creating a shortcut to the desktop of \"ShocknAwe.exe\" and rename the shortcut to Team Sabre.  This way you have both ShocknAwe and Team Sabre mods ready to play on your desktop!

Enjoy!

Works online, updates of the game, everything. :)
